mapper.select: select no, name, seilling_price as seillingPrice, concat(left(g.viewdetail,30),'...') as detail, (select name from tblSmallCategory where no = g.smallcategory_no) as smallcategoryName, (select name from tblBigCategory where no =(select bigcategory_no from tblSmallCategory where no = g.smallcategory_no)) as bigcategoryName, seilling_price as seillingPrice, (select image from tblGoodsImages where goods_no=g.no and ismain='y') as thumbnail from tblGoods g where display_status = 'y' and isdel is null order by no desc limit 8 offset #{startNo}

select no, name, (select name from tblSmallCategory where no = g.smallcategory_no) as smallcategoryName, (select name from tblBigCategory where no =(select bigcategory_no from tblSmallCategory where no = g.smallcategory_no)) as bigcategoryName, seilling_price as seillingPrice, concat(left(g.viewdetail,30),'...') as detail, (select image from tblGoodsImages where goods_no=g.no and ismain='y') as thumbnail from tblGoods g where display_status = 'y' and g.isdel is null and name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or smallcategory_no in (select no from tblSmallCategory where name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')) order by no

select g.no as no, g.name as name, concat(left(g.viewdetail,30),'...') as detail, s.name as smallcategoryName, b.name as bigcategoryName, g.seilling_price as seillingPrice, (select image from tblGoodsImages where goods_no=g.no and ismain='y') as thumbnail from tblGoods g inner join tblSmallCategory s on s.no = g.smallcategory_no inner join tblBigCategory b on b.no = s.bigcategory_no where g.display_status = 'y' and g.isdel is null and g.smallcategory_no = #{smallcategoryNo} order by no

select g.no as no, g.name as name, s.name as smallcategoryName, b.name as bigcategoryName, concat(left(g.detail,30),'...') as detail, g.seilling_price as seillingPrice, (select image from tblGoodsImages where goods_no=g.no and ismain='y') as thumbnail from tblGoods g inner join tblSmallCategory s on s.no = g.smallcategory_no inner join tblBigCategory b on b.no = s.bigcategory_no where g.display_status = 'y' and g.isdel is null and g.no in (select goods_no from tblMaindisplay where maindisplay_no = #{maindisplayNo}) order by g.no

select no, name, (select name from tblSmallCategory where no = g.smallcategory_no) as smallcategoryName, (select name from tblBigCategory where no =(select bigcategory_no from tblSmallCategory where no = g.smallcategory_no)) as bigcategoryName, seilling_price as seillingPrice, detail, regdate, material, supplier, manufacturer, manufacturing_date as manufacturingDate, origin from tblGoods g where no = #{no}
select no, goods_no as goodsNo, image, ismain from tblGoodsImages where ismain= 'n' and goods_no = #{no}
select no, goods_no as goodsNo, image, ismain from tblGoodsImages where ismain= 'y' and goods_no = #{no}
select no, goods_no as goodsNo, option_name as optionName, inventory_qty as inventoryQty, available_qty as availableQty from tblGoodsDetail where goods_no = #{no} and isable='y'
select s.name as smallcategoryName, b.name as bigcategoryName from tblSmallCategory s inner join tblBigCategory b on s.bigcategory_no = b.no where s.no=#{smallCategoryNo};
select no,name from tblMaindisplay_category where isshow='y'
